_comment: Created by EFisher on 26/03/2014 16:44:07 using v2.1
title: How has the proportion of patients feeling threatened in hospital changed?
analysis_commentary: The national responses to this question have remained fairly constant since 2007, with the majority of patients (97% in 2012) not feeling threatened during their stay in hospital by other patients or visitors.
data_source: Care Quality Commission, Survey of Adult Inpatients
